Title: Requires vehicle rental agreements instruct renters to remove personal information before returning the vehicle and permits rental vehicles to have decals informing the renter to remove such information
Summary: Requires rental vehicles have any personal information removed from the vehicle once returned.
LawCode: Add ยง391-r, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring rental vehicles have any personal information removed from the vehicle once returned
